value.title: Establish a Power BI environment
value.excerpt: This module covers topics relating to establishing a Power BI environment within Office 365 containers.

value.title: Establish a data access infrastructure in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to establish a data access infrastructure for accessing all your data within Power BI.

value.title: Understand the Power BI administrator role
value.excerpt: Learn how to administer Power BI to support business decisions backed by data.

value.title: Create and manage a Power BI deployment pipeline
value.excerpt: The deployment pipelines tool enables Power BI creators to manage the development lifecycle of organizational content.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
value.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

value.title: Understand scalability in Power BI
value.excerpt: Scalable data models enable enterprise-scale analytics in Power BI. Implement data modeling best practices, use large dataset storage format, and practice building a star schema to design analytics solutions that can scale.

value.title: Avoid refresh errors with missing columns in Power BI/Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? Here I show you how to avoid new columns for getting added and refresh error from missing columns.  I learnt this by watching Microsoft Power BI webinar with Chris Webb: https://info.microsoft.com/CO-PowerBI-WBNR-FY16-06Jun-21-Amazing-Things-with-Power-BI-Registration.html?Is=Website
